Name: CANCELLATION_CODE
Description: Reason for Cancellation of flight: A - Airline/Carrier; B - Weather; C - National Air System; D - Security

Name: LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY
Description: Delay caused by aircraft reaching late

Name: DEP_DELAY
Description: Total Delay on Departure in minutes

Name: TAXI_OUT
Description: The time duration elapsed between departure from the origin airport gate and wheels off

Name: WHEELS_OFF
Description: The time point that the aircraft?s wheels leave the ground

Name: WHEELS_ON
Description: The time point that the aircraft?s wheels touch on the ground

Name: TAXI_IN
Description: The time duration elapsed between wheels-on and gate arrival at the destination airport

Name: ARR_DELAY
Description: Total Delay on Arrival in minutes

Name: DIVERTED
Description: Aircraft landed on airport that out of schedule

Name: CRS_ELAPSED_TIME
Description: Planned time amount needed for the flight trip

Name: AIR_TIME
Description: The time duration between wheels_off and wheels_on time

Name: CARRIER_DELAY
Description: Delay caused by the airline in minutes
